fields.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return detailed information for, when returning the `indices` metric family (supports wildcards)

metric_family.description: Limit the information returned to a certain metric family

metric.description: Limit the information returned for `indices` family to a specific metric. Isn't used if `indices` (or `all`) metric family isn't specified.

node_id.description: A comma-separated list of node IDs or names to limit the returned information; use `_local` to return information from the node you're connecting to, leave empty to get information from all nodes

fields.description: A comma-separated list of fields for `fielddata` metric (supports wildcards)
